website_summaries.verdict: This is a reliable and easy-to-use contact solution to keep eyes moistened and ensure comfort all day long.
pros: Doesn’t require users to soak contact lenses in solution, making this a quick and easy way to keep lenses clean and comfortable
Assists in keeping eyes well-lubricated all day long
Is known to be gentle on eyes while also refreshing them
cons: Not the best product for contact solution for colored contacts by Air Optics

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Contact Solution
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I would just use the cheapest or generic brand contact solution since I figured there wasn't much difference between them, but boy was I wrong. My optometrist suggested I use this particular solution after complaining of irritation and dryness among other problems and I can't tell you how much difference this solution has made. When it comes to the health of your eyes and your sight, I wouldn't recommend being a cheapskate. You pay for what you get, right?
customer_reviews.author: piercing elf

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp with your eyes - recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Sure you can buy other contact solution that is a bit cheaper, but I wouldn't recommend it. When I switched to a cheaper store brand, my optometrist noticed build up on my contacts. I noticed how much better my eyes felt after switching back to the ReNu solution. Do yourself a favor and don't buy the cheap stuff for your eyes! I also like the contact case each box contains. It's a good idea to swap these out every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order of two bottles. One bottle was just about empty even though it had the plastic seal on it. There was an obvious leak.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for sensitive eyes. I've been using this as a storing solution for years but I recommend something for a deep clean if your contacts get gunky from makeup or something. Great double package for convenience and price better than in store.
customer_reviews.author: A-Wall

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not what it used to be. Recommend green bottle B&L instead.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not what it used to be. The product does not remove protein and keep the lenses soft and comfortable to wear even past their recommended wearing period. For a while I thought I was wearing defective lenses back to back but then I found out it was the Bausch & Lomb being defective or not what it used to be. With the same lenses I thought were defective, I switched to the Bausch & Lomb green bottle (forgot its name) and the lenses became wearable. I was advise against buying the blue bottle of Bausch and Lomb. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: H&J B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price and gets the job done of moisturizing your extra set of eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Missing lid
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this items without problem. But this time it comes with missing lid. I searched everywhere and I am pretty sure there is no lid in this package
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine BoJuanJuan

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product was tainted or something. Tried it for the first time...woke to eyelids being crusted/matted. Stopped wearing my contacts for 1 week. Week later tryed again with new soft contacts and it happened again. I did not have pink eye. Immediately stopped using. I contacted company. They quickly responded. They had me send back product and I got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Scheihing

customer_reviews.title: ReNu Bausch + Lomb renu Lens Solution Advanced Triple Disinfect Formula
customer_reviews.text: As someone who's had contacts for more than half of my life, I have used a ton of different kinds of solution. Re-nu Advanced Formula is the one I keep going back to. It provides the best moisturizing and cleansing properties, while still being such a great value. I have tried off brand, and I have tried very expensive brands, but this one does the best job for the least money. It's amazing. I buy the two-pack so I always have one around.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Best contact solution!
customer_reviews.text: I love this contact solution and am loyal to this brand. Amazon selling it makes it super convenient to get it now, and I always get the twin pack so that my family members and I can each have our own. It’s super moisturizing, which is important to me as I have daily contacts that I reuse for a few days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kento

customer_reviews.title: not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: To me, this is just an overpriced saline solution. It seems like it was the same thing I used to pay $2 to rinse my lenses after disinfecting. My lenses are so uncomfortable after using this - i plan on switching back to biotrue, that seemed to be the best!
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Contacts
customer_reviews.text: It could just be me but my contacts kept being blurry and I couldn't figure out why. I almost went to the eye doctor until I went to my boyfriends house and used a different brand and the contacts were fine. So overall, this brand didn't work for me it made my contacts strange and I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Smith

customer_reviews.title: The Best Contact Solution Out There
customer_reviews.text: I used Opti-Free for about nine years but then they changed their formula and I had a BAD allergic reaction to it. I thought it was my lenses but it it persisted even after I changed lenses. It got so bad that I had to stop wearing contacts for over a year. But my experience with ReNu has been completely different. My lenses just feel cleaner and fresher. And it doesn’t irritate my eyes at all. There are cheaper solutions but this is involving your eyes, so I strongly suggest you go for quality over affordability. Trust me it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: GeminiFeed

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes re-wear my disposable contacts which makes it incredibly important they are clean, disinfected and comfortable to wear 2 days in a row. I have not had any issues to date and will continue to use this brand. My contacts actually feel new the second day which stretches my budget much further. *I am not in any way suggesting anyone should do anything other than follow the directions and guidelines for contact lens wear from their doctor.
customer_reviews.author: blog, drink, beach, repeat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected and a great product. Leave my eyes feeling moisturized theought the day
customer_reviews.author: Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Only Solution I Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this solution since I've started wearing contacts about four or five years ago and I love it. I always buy the double packs because I feel like I get more for my money and I love that it comes with a new contact case! I have really dry eyes and they're fairly sensitive, but this solution will last all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine S

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long, cheap, and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Have never found such a large amount of contact solution for so cheap lasts me about 6 months each bottle, although I don't wear my contacts daily, my eye doctor has told me that have dry eyes but this solution does not make it seem as though I do. And when my eyes do feel itchy or dry I simply drop a bit into my contact and it fixes it! I reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Ruined New Contacts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my brand New Contacts!!! Absolutely Horrible cloudy filmy oily Residue on my brand new contacts From THIS solution, that not even protein remover will remove! I Had Been using this brand for a decade, but No More! My eyes are hurting and strained and irritated from just 1 use of this with Brand new out of the box contacts. They either changed the formula, or quality has severely diminished; I don't know, but I won't use this ever again!
customer_reviews.author: KHALEESI STELLARUM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for infrequent wearers.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily wear my contacts when at the gym or when playing VR games, so a few hours a day. I have astigmatism in both eyes and my contacts are made to orient themselves correctly when I blink by having one side thicker than the other. For this reason, my contacts aren't super comfortable in the first place, but this solution has allowed me to get a lot more longevity out of my disposable lenses before they become unbearable. The bottles are too big for travel, however.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: The best solution still!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that my wife uses and we have switched between brands such as Blink etc. and she always still comes back to wanting to use Renu Bausch. Her reason is simple: it hydrates her contact lens the best and keeps her eyes from being dry the longest. She works long hours in the office and being able to use a high-quality product such as this one is imperative. Amazon offers an easy way to get the solution for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ong

customer_reviews.title: Delayed
customer_reviews.text: Solution is good. Main disappointment was that it was scheduled to be delivered the following da, which is why I ordered it, oh no it got delayed all of a sudden and the original box it can in was completely damaged Not happy with the packaging but product seems to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's good for sensitive eyes but a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit expensive. I just realize that buying this at Costco is cheaper. It's 2 bottles 16 Oz each + 2 bottles 2 Oz each travel size + 2 len cases for the same price. In this bundle they only have 2 bottles 12 Oz each with ONLY 1 lens case. I have been wearing contact for only s year but I think this solution is the best for sensitive eyes. I also tried Bausch and Lomb Biotrue and Acuvue Revitalens (new product) and both of them made my upper eyelid itching for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tristian Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used this contact solution with no issues and I have dry eyes. Amazon has a way cheaper price point on this two pack than most stores so I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: My favorite solution
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my eyes moisturized all day! I got some contact eye drops and forget to use them for most of the day because my eyes rarely dry out thanks to this solution. This has been really convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L

customer_reviews.title: One bottle without seal
customer_reviews.text: The box looks to be brand new. Unfortunately, when I opened, one bottles hasn’t the sealed around it! And, I can tell that it was less cleanser in the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and eyes don’t dry out!
customer_reviews.text: Just switched to this brand and I’m so glad I did. So gentle on the eyes and I’ve noticed since using this product that my eyes aren’t as dry! This will be my new brand of contact cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Monyclay

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. I'm not picky as to which disinfecting solution I use, just like to rotate brands. But this renu is very good.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE

customer_reviews.title: Costco has the largest size bottles at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying the larger bottles for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Magnavito

customer_reviews.title: Best contact solution
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years, I’ve tried several contact solutions and this product is the only one that keeps my contacts moisturized and cleans them well— I can keep my contacts for a long time I believe because of this product. 10/10 recommend if you have contacts.
customer_reviews.author: rachel miller

customer_reviews.title: Great solution, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this solution. This is the only solution I use when I do wear contacts. Whenever I buy it in store I always find the smaller bottles, never the bigger ones. However TWO big bottles for an affordable price.., so awesome!! This will definitely last me a while!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Winston

customer_reviews.title: Read description
customer_reviews.text: If you only want a skirt. Then buy this. I had to cut the top off with a knife to get more than a splash.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie G. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this multi purpose lens solution for the past 8 months and have had great results. I used to suffer from random infections using other name brands but this one has never caused a problem. It leaves my contact solution feeling fresh and brand new every time I use it. This is a great bargain for the price on amazon and would rather buy it here online than in store anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Used for years the best cleaning solution for me
customer_reviews.text: I clean and soak my lenses in Renu. I love the product, it works very well and is comfortable but I rinse with saline prior to placing in my eyes only because of cost I like to flush lenses well before putting in my eyes and I can use a lot of saline at the fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: Minara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from excellent brand delivered quickly by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is for: ReNu Bausch + Lomb renu Lens Solution Advanced Triple Disinfect Formula Multi-Purpose, 12 Ounce B Works exactly as it is supposed to. Great product that helps care for your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Help

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love Bausch and Lomb. Works great for my soft lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value pack!
customer_reviews.text: I chose the 16oz at checkout and didn't actually realize it was a double pack plus! This arrived quickly and is the exact product pictured; including two large bottles, one smaller size and a contact lens case. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond In The Ruff Lhasas

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand of contact solution for as long as I can remember and the total price, with my Prime membership, was cheaper than, and less of a hassle than driving to the store. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. doesn't keep my contacts comfortable as long as other solutions
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Contact lens solution
customer_reviews.text: Great value pack. Save money to buy the pack than the single bottle one. However this brand is not as moisture as other one. I have noticed my eyes are quite dry lately.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia B

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried this brand, but I am pleased I did! It’s so moisturizing! It makes my contacts really soft and the price wasn’t bad. Fast shipping. You gotta try this brand if you haven’t.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for its price !! Almost the size of a standard hairbrush. It comes with two bottles and a free contact lenses case ! Perfect solution for moisturizer and cleanser. VERY FAST SHIPPING !! ABSOLUTELY LOVE! WILL BUY MORE ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Blü

customer_reviews.title: Nice contact disinfect
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you get, I tried buying it in drug stores and supermarkets but they where all out. This is the only place has it. Does what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbybsw

customer_reviews.title: Eye len cleaner for Contact Lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Returned because I was looking for len cleaner I a bottle for eye glzsses.This item is for use with contact lenses so inappropriate for my needs.Was not evident in description that this cleanser was a kit for cleaning contact lens.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn  Stronach

customer_reviews.title: Words to the wise
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great and helps improve the life of your contract lenses, it also makes a good eye wash if you get anything in your eyes, used it when i had to get sprayed by OC for work. It might have taken an entire bottle, but i was able to see again. Ps. If your planning on being sprayed by anything like OC, take out your contacts first. You'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: D troy

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: If you're someone like me who wears contact lenses everyday this is the one to get. Great quality for affordable price
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: The solution to my problem
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I knew this was the solution for me 😂. The size is definitely worth the price and thank you for the free case. I know this gonna last me for more than 3 months. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheye TnT

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper, but my eyes felt really dry after the fourth day. My eyes felt itchy and dirty. I had to switch back to my other contact lens cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable and resulted in blurry vision after a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: This solution dries out my eyes like no other. After a couple of hours of having my contacts in after they have soaked in this solution, my vision became blurry and I had trouble seeing while driving. After about a week, I switched to another brand so that I could see when I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Goose

customer_reviews.title: Best kind
customer_reviews.text: We use this one often and we love to buy it off Amazon because it shows up the next t day and a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Weese

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have never used these (mostly due to the price). I’d say wait for a coupon and then they are well worth it! They keep my contacts moisturized and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: I use B& L's great new Formula.
customer_reviews.text: It's been many years since I have been a customer and using B&L products. This Newer formula works great for me. I look forward to when B&L makes Multifocal Extended Wear Contact Lens. This would renew and revive Their historical leadership and/or status in Vision Improvement. Sincerely, L. H
customer_reviews.author: linda hp

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my contacts clean, and keeps my eyes from drying out during the day. I hardly ever need resetting drops any more.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. Have had no issues with it. Leaves contacts feeling great in the morning. Comparable to other major brands.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than opti free!
customer_reviews.text: This 2 pack is cheaper on amazon than any store I've found it at. Switched to this after using Opti free pure moist for years, just because its so much cheaper. I can't even tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kc143

customer_reviews.title: Go-to solution
customer_reviews.text: I got this twin pack solution for my bf who this all the time for his contacts. He loves this stuff and this is his go-to solution.

customer_reviews.title: Yup yup
customer_reviews.text: Yay just got these awesome bottles from the convenience of my doorstep. I bought some colored contacts from a diff place and got these and some holders super quick.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent contact solution. I use my contacts upwards of 18-20 hours some days and this solution keeps them feeling great for the entire time.

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: I really like this contact solution. It keeps my contacts moist throughout the day and I like how much I received when I got it.

customer_reviews.text: I like the product, does exactly what it says it going to do. Not sure why they asked me to rate moisture and comfort, though

customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of contact solution. I always used the Walmart brand solution, but I think I’ll be using this one from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Good at it’s job
customer_reviews.text: You can get a better value at Sam’s, but I needed this in a pinch. Good solution and does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it

I am very impressed but even though you can put them in your eyes as last minute eye drops, it feels like they don’t do anything for your eyes so I suggest you still have regular eye moistening drops which will save you more contact solution.

customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: ReNu Bausch + Lomb renu Lens Solution Advanced Triple Disinfect Formula Multi-Purpose, 12 Ounce Bottle Twinpack
product_meta.description: Size:12 Ounce (Pack of 2)ReNu Advanced Formula multi-purpose contact lens solution delivers excellent disinfection and cleaning, while providing up to 20 hours of moisture. Do not swap or share contact lenses with anyone
feature_bullets: renu ADVANCED FORMULA: Our newest contact lens innovation, this multi-purpose solution has a triple disinfectant that works in only 4 hours to kill 99.9% of germs1. Hydrate your lenses for all-day comfort.
MULTI-PURPOSE LENS SOLUTION: renu multipurpose contact lens solution can be used daily to clean your lenses, store them in a contact lens case when not being worn, or disinfect and rinse lenses.
SIMPLIFY YOUR CONTACT LENS CARE: Go beyond clean and keep your contacts feeling clean and comfortable with renu contact solution.

renu FROM BAUSCH + LOMB: renu Advanced Formula is our newest innovation in lens care & replaces both renu fresh & renu sensitive with one solution created to help enhance your lens wearing experience.
BAUSCH + LOMB CONTACT LENS SOLUTION: Go beyond clean with renu. Nothing disinfects better2.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
